title: Romain Grosjean completes Haas F1 test five years after fireball crash
summary: Five years after his horrific accident, Romain Grosjean has returned to an F1 car, in a test with his former team, Haas

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Romain Grosjean drive for before his accident in Formula 1?
What significant event occurred to Romain Grosjean during the 2020 Bahrain Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He had a horrific crash and a fireball incident.

qa_pairs.question: How many years passed between Romain Grosjean's accident and his return to testing an F1 car?
